services.name: Chemical Inventory Management API
services.description: This API provides manufacturing companies with real-time tracking and managing of their chemical inventory levels. The service facilitates compliance with safety regulations and optimized inventory control.

services.name: Construction Material Delivery Tracker
services.description: Enables companies to monitor the transport and delivery of construction materials, ensuring timely deliveries, minimizing delays, and improving supply chain management.

services.name: Forest Product Yield Calculation Service
services.description: Offers logging companies tools to calculate and forecast yields from forest product harvesting based on data such as location, tree type, and environmental factors.

services.name: Glass Manufacturing Process Automation API
services.description: Designed for glass production facilities to manage production workflows, monitor machine performance, and ensure quality control metrics are met effectively.

services.name: Mine and Mineral Operational Analytics
services.description: Supports mining operators by providing insights into excavation operations, tracking output levels, and ensuring adherence to mining regulation standards.
